text.codebreaker.guide:
Guess the hidden code by selecting colors!
A failed guess will show hits, blows, and misses.
An acacia button indicates a hit; one guessed color is in the correct spot.
A stone button indicates a blow; one guessed color is present on the actual code.
A birch button indicates a miss; one guessed color is not present on the actual code.
text.codebreaker.lose: Nobody won the game within %s rounds!
text.codebreaker.no_turn: There is no player with the turn.
